name: CVE-2011-0660
description: The SMB client in Microsoft Windows XP SP2 and SP3, Windows Server 2003 SP2, Windows Vista SP1 and SP2, Windows Server 2008 Gold, SP2, R2, and R2 SP1, and Windows 7 Gold and SP1 allows remote SMB servers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted (1) SMBv1 or (2) SMBv2 response, aka "SMB Client Response Parsing Vulnerability."
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:x86:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:x64:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:-:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_xp:*:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2003:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_2003_server:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_2003_server:*:sp2:itanium:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:*:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:*:itanium:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:x86:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp1:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:*:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:r2:x64:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:*:r2:itanium:*:*:*:*:*')]
